sectiondef.header: DesignWare I2S Interrupt Callback Routine Select Marcos

description.para: DesignWare I2S interrupt callback routines select macros definitions

briefdescription.para: check expressions used in DesignWare I2S driver implementation

memberdef.name: DW_I2S_CHANNEL_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: (((val == DW_I2S_CHANNEL0) && (channels & DW_I2S_CHANNEL0_SUPPORTED)) || \ ((val == DW_I2S_CHANNEL1) && (channels & DW_I2S_CHANNEL1_SUPPORTED)) || \ ((val == DW_I2S_CHANNEL2) && (channels & DW_I2S_CHANNEL2_SUPPORTED)) || \ ((val == DW_I2S_CHANNEL3) && (channels & DW_I2S_CHANNEL3_SUPPORTED)))

briefdescription.para: valid check of I2S info object
Disable DesignWare I2S RX and flush all FIFOs.
Enable DesignWare I2S RX IP.
Disable DesignWare I2S TX and flush all FIFOs.
Enable DesignWare I2S TX IP.
Disable DesignWare I2S RX block.
Enable DesignWare I2S RX block.
Disable DesignWare I2S TX block.
Enable DesignWare I2S TX block.
Disable DesignWare I2S RX channel.
Enable DesignWare I2S RX channel.
Disable DesignWare I2S TX channel.
Enable DesignWare I2S TX channel.
Clear DesignWare I2S RX overrun interrupt.
Clear DesignWare I2S TX overrun interrupt.
Enable DesignWare I2S RX bit interrupt with mask.
Disable DesignWare I2S RX bit interrupt with mask.
Enable DesignWare I2S TX bit interrupt with mask.
Disable DesignWare I2S TX bit interrupt with mask.
Get DesignWare I2S Transmit Channel Empty Trigger (TXCHET)
Set DesignWare I2S Transmit Channel Empty Trigger (TXCHET)
Get DesignWare I2S Receive Channel Data Available Trigger (RXCHDT)
Set DesignWare I2S Receiver Channel Data Available Trigger (RXCHDT)
Enable DesignWare I2S TX clock generation.
Disable DesignWare I2S TX clock generation.
Enable DesignWare I2S RX clock generation.
Disable DesignWare I2S RX clock generation.
Set DesignWare I2S TX clock configuration word select line (ws_out)
Set DesignWare I2S RX clock configuration word select line (ws_out)
Reset DesignWare I2S RX FIFO, flush all the RX FIFOs (a self clearing bit)
Reset DesignWare I2S TX FIFO, flush all the TX FIFOs (a self clearing bit)
open a designware i2s device

parameterdescription.para: Device initialized parameters are different with parameters in IP

briefdescription.para: Close a DesignWare I2S device.

parameterdescription.para: Close successfully without any issues (including that device is already closed)
Device is still opened, the device opn_cnt decreased by 1

briefdescription.para: Control I2S by ctrl command.

parameterdescription.para: control command, to change or get some thing related to i2s
parameters that maybe argument of the command, or return values of the command, must not be NULL
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid for current control command
Control device failed, due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
Control device failed, due to different reasons like in transfer state
Control command is not supported or not valid

memberdef.argsstring: (DEV_I2S *i2s_obj, const void *data, uint32_t len, uint32_t channel)
memberdef.name: dw_i2s_write

briefdescription.para: poll transmit data through DesignWare I2S as master or slave

parameterdescription.para: data length need to send, no timeout check
Byte count that was successfully sent for poll method, it might can't send that much due to I2S_ERROR_STATE.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Device is still in transfer state
Can't write data to hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled

briefdescription.para: Read data through DesignWare I2S as master or slave.

parameterdescription.para: data that need to receive (data must be uint32_t type), uint32_t(left) and uint32_t(right) alternating
Byte count that was successfully received for poll method, it might can't send that much due to I2S_ERROR_STATE.
Device object is not valid or not exists
Device is still in receive state
Can't read data from hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled

briefdescription.para: DesignWare I2S interrupt processing routine.
DesignWare I2S interrupt processing routine.
